name: Fertilizer, winter wheat straw, 2022
description: Fertilizer input for on hectare of average US winter wheat projected for the year 2022. Considers only the amount of fertilizers attributable to straw removal. Transportation from the factory to the regional storehouse is included. Transport from the storehouse to the outlet and farm is not included.
category: 11: Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting/1151: Support Activities for Crop Production

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

flow.category: Technosphere Flows/11: Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting/1151: Support Activities for Crop Production
